meanings.definition: A person who is authorized to judge or decide on a disputed issue.
meanings.sent1: The referees made fair decisions during the soccer game.
meanings.sent2: The referees in the basketball match wore black and white stripes.
meanings.sent3: The referees at the spelling bee were very serious about their job.
meanings.sent4: In the court of law, the judge serves as the ultimate referee.
meanings.sent5: The referees at the debate competition were attentive and unbiased.

meanings.definition: To act as a referee in a game or match.
meanings.sent1: During the tournament, she referees the final soccer match.
meanings.sent2: He referees the tennis games with precision and fairness.
meanings.sent3: She referees the family board game nights to ensure everyone follows the rules.
meanings.sent4: In the boxing ring, the referee must quickly intervene to maintain safety.
meanings.sent5: Refereeing the chess championship requires a deep understanding of the game.
